trans-unit.source: Example: You want to create a datastore with a iSCSI LUN that is visible on 3 hosts in a single vSphere cluster (esxi1, esxi2 and esxi3). When you create the datastore on esxi1, the datastore will be automatically mounted on esxi2 and esxi3, without the need to configure the resource on either of those two hosts.
trans-unit.target: 示例：您要创建一个具有iSCSI LUN的数据存储，该iSCSI LUN在单个vSphere群集中的3台主机（ esxi1 ， esxi2 和 esxi3 ）上可见。在 esxi1 上创建数据存储时，该数据存储将自动安装在 esxi2 和 esxi3 上，而无需在这两个主机中的任何一个上配置资源。

trans-unit.source: Except as otherwise noted, the resources that read secrets from Vault are designed such that they require only the read capability on the relevant resources.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有说明，否则从Vault读取机密的资源的设计使其仅需要对相关资源的读取功能。

trans-unit.source: Except as otherwise noted, the resources that write secrets into Vault are designed such that they require only the create and update capabilities on the relevant resources, so that distinct tokens can be used for reading vs. writing and thus limit the exposure of a compromised token.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有说明，否则将机密信息写入保管库的资源的设计使其仅需要在相关资源上创建和更新功能，以便可以将不同的令牌用于读写，从而限制了泄露的令牌的风险。 。

trans-unit.source: Existence of any resource instance belonging to a particular provider in the current state. For example, if a particular resource is removed from configuration, it continues to create a dependency on its provider until its instances have been destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 当前状态下属于特定提供者的任何资源实例的存在。例如，如果从配置中删除了特定资源，则该资源将继续对其提供者产生依赖关系，直到其实例被销毁为止。

trans-unit.source: Finally, Terraform can download modules directly from various storage providers and version control systems. These sources do not support versioning and other registry benefits, but can be convenient for getting started when already available within an organization. The full list of available sources are documented in the module sources documentation.
trans-unit.target: 最后，Terraform可以直接从各种存储提供商和版本控制系统下载模块。这些资源不支持版本控制和其他注册表优点，但是在组织内已经可用的情况下可以方便地上手。可用来源的完整列表记录在模块来源文档中。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it's possible to test these values work as expected by first logging in:
trans-unit.target: 最后,可以通过先登录来测试这些数值是否能达到预期的效果。

trans-unit.source: Finally, reference the encrypted ciphertext in your resource definitions:
trans-unit.target: 最后,在您的资源定义中引用加密的密文。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the CLI manages backups for you automatically. If you make a mistake modifying your state, the state CLI will always have a backup available for you that you can restore.
trans-unit.target: 最后,CLI会自动为你管理备份。如果你在修改状态时犯了错误,状态CLI将始终为你提供一个可以恢复的备份。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we can create the client_secret by selecting Keys and then generating a new key by entering a description, selecting how long the client_secret should be valid for - and finally pressing Save. This value will only be visible whilst on the page, so be sure to copy it now (otherwise you'll need to regenerate a new key).
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们可以通过选择“ 密钥”来创建 client_secret ，然后通过输入描述，选择 client_secret 的有效期限-并最终按下Save来生成新密钥。该值仅在页面上可见，因此请确保立即复制它（否则，您将需要重新生成一个新密钥）。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we create an AutoScaling Group that actually launches EC2 instances based on the AutoScaling Launch Configuration.
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们创建一个AutoScaling Group,根据AutoScaling Launch配置实际启动EC2实例。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we must recompile the binary and instruct Terraform to reinitialize it by rerunning terraform init. This is only necessary because we have modified the code and recompiled the binary, and it no longer matches an internal hash Terraform uses to ensure the same binaries are used for each operation.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们必须重新编译二进制文件，并通过重新运行 terraform init 来指示Terraform重新初始化它。这仅是必需的，因为我们已经修改了代码并重新编译了二进制文件，并且它不再与Terraform用于确保每个操作使用相同二进制文件的内部哈希匹配。

trans-unit.source: Finally, you need to create an API Gateway "deployment" in order to activate the configuration and expose the API at a URL that can be used for testing:
trans-unit.target: 最后,你需要创建一个API网关 "部署",以便激活配置,并在一个可以用于测试的URL上暴露API。

trans-unit.source: First, let's encrypt a password with KMS using the AWS CLI tools. This requires you to have your AWS CLI setup correctly, and you would replace the key-id with your own. If you have a newline character at the end of your file, secrets will be decrypted with this newline character intact. For most use-cases this is undesirable and leads to incorrect passwords or invalid values, as well as possible changes in the plan. Alternatively you can use --plaintext 'password' instead of reading from a file.
trans-unit.target: 首先，让我们使用AWS CLI工具通过KMS加密密码。这要求您正确设置AWS CLI，并用自己的密钥ID替换。如果文件末尾有换行符，则将使用此换行符完整地解密秘密。在大多数用例中，这是不希望的，并且会导致错误的密码或无效的值以及计划中可能的更改。或者，您可以使用 --plaintext 'password' 代替从文件中读取。

trans-unit.source: First, when using the ssh connection type the destination directory must already exist. If you need to create it, use a remote-exec provisioner just prior to the file provisioner in order to create the directory. When using the winrm connection type the destination directory will be created for you if it doesn't already exist.
trans-unit.target: 首先，在使用 ssh 连接类型时，目标目录必须已经存在。如果需要创建它，请在文件供应商之前使用remote-exec供应商来创建目录。使用 winrm 连接类型时，将为您创建目标目录（如果尚不存在）。

trans-unit.source: Firstly navigate to the Azure Active Directory overview within the Azure Portal - then select the App Registration blade and click Endpoints at the top of the App Registration blade. A list of URIs will be displayed and you need to locate the URI for OAUTH 2.0 AUTHORIZATION ENDPOINT which contains a GUID. This is your Tenant ID / the tenant_id field mentioned above.
trans-unit.target: 首先，导航到Azure门户中的Azure Active Directory概述 - 然后选择“ 应用程序注册”刀片，然后单击“ 应用程序注册”刀片顶部的“ 端点 ” 。将显示URI列表，您需要找到包含GUID的OAUTH 2.0 AUTHORIZATION ENDPOINT的URI 。这是您的租户ID / 上面提到的 tenant_id 字段。

trans-unit.source: For remote state, the workspaces are stored directly in the configured backend. For example, if you use Consul, the workspaces are stored by appending the environment name to the state path. To ensure that workspace names are stored correctly and safely in all backends, the name must be valid to use in a URL path segment without escaping.
trans-unit.target: 对于远程状态，工作空间直接存储在配置的后端中。例如，如果使用Consul，则通过将环境名称附加到状态路径来存储工作空间。为了确保工作区名称正确且安全地存储在所有后端中，该名称必须有效，才能在URL路径段中使用而不会转义。

trans-unit.source: For AWS accounts created after 2013-12-04, each region comes with a Default VPC. This is an advanced resource, and has special caveats to be aware of when using it. Please read this document in its entirety before using this resource.

trans-unit.source: For EC2 Classic accounts, each region comes with a Default Security Group. Additionally, each VPC created in AWS comes with a Default Security Group that can be managed, but not destroyed. This is an advanced resource, and has special caveats to be aware of when using it. Please read this document in its entirety before using this resource.
trans-unit.target: 对于EC2经典帐户，每个区域都带有一个默认安全组。此外，在AWS中创建的每个VPC都带有一个默认安全组，可以对其进行管理，但不能对其进行销毁。这是一种高级资源，使用时有一些特别注意事项。在使用本资源之前，请完整阅读本文档。

trans-unit.source: For convenience in simple configurations, a child module automatically inherits default (un-aliased) provider configurations from its parent. This means that explicit provider blocks appear only in the root module, and downstream modules can simply declare resources for that provider and have them automatically associated with the root provider configurations.
trans-unit.target: 为了简化配置，子模块会自动从其父级继承默认（未别名）的提供程序配置。这意味着显式 provider 块仅出现在根模块中，而下游模块可以简单地声明该提供程序的资源，并使它们自动与根提供程序配置关联。

trans-unit.source: For day-to-day use it is strongly recommended not to rely on this mechanism and to instead provide the discovery document on the standard port, since this allows use of the most user-friendly hostname form.
trans-unit.target: 对于日常使用，强烈建议不要依赖此机制，而应在标准端口上提供发现文档，因为这允许使用最用户友好的主机名形式。

trans-unit.source: For larger deployment packages it is recommended by Amazon to upload via S3, since the S3 API has better support for uploading large files efficiently.

trans-unit.source: For larger infrastructures, querying every resource is too slow. Many cloud providers do not provide APIs to query multiple resources at once, and the round trip time for each resource is hundreds of milliseconds. On top of this, cloud providers almost always have API rate limiting so Terraform can only request a certain number of resources in a period of time. Larger users of Terraform make heavy use of the -refresh=false flag as well as the -target flag in order to work around this. In these scenarios, the cached state is treated as the record of truth.
trans-unit.target: 对于较大的基础架构，查询每个资源都太慢。许多云提供商没有提供用于一次查询多个资源的API，每个资源的往返时间为数百毫秒。最重要的是，云提供商几乎总是具有API速率限制，因此Terraform在一段时间内只能请求一定数量的资源。为了解决此问题，较大的Terraform用户大量使用 -refresh=false 标志和 -target 标志。在这些情况下，将缓存的状态视为真实记录。

trans-unit.source: For local state, Terraform stores the workspace states in a directory called terraform.tfstate.d. This directory should be be treated similarly to local-only terraform.tfstate; some teams commit these files to version control, although using a remote backend instead is recommended when there are multiple collaborators.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地状态，Terraform将工作空间状态存储在名为 terraform.tfstate.d 的目录中。应将此目录与仅本地 terraform.tfstate 类似地对待；有些团队将这些文件提交到版本控制中，但是当有多个协作者时，建议使用远程后端。

trans-unit.source: For modules maintained within your organization, a version range strategy may be appropriate if a semantic versioning methodology is used consistently or if there is a well-defined release process that avoids unwanted updates.
trans-unit.target: 对于在您的组织内维护的模块,如果始终如一地使用语义版本管理方法,或者如果有一个定义明确的发布流程,可以避免不必要的更新,那么版本范围策略可能是合适的。

trans-unit.source: For modules, a minimum version is recommended, such as > 0.8.0. This minimum version ensures that a module operates as expected, but gives the consumer flexibility to use newer versions.
trans-unit.target: 对于模块，建议使用最低版本，例如 > 0.8.0 。此最低版本可确保模块按预期运行，但给消费者提供了使用较新版本的灵活性。

trans-unit.source: For provisioners other than local execution, you must specify connection settings so Terraform knows how to communicate with the resource.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地执行以外的供应者，必须指定连接设置，以便Terraform知道如何与资源进行通信。

trans-unit.source: For pull requests that follow the guidelines, we expect to be able to review and merge very quickly.
trans-unit.target: 对于遵循指南的拉取请求,我们希望能够很快地审核和合并。

trans-unit.source: For routine use it is recommended to check out configuration from version control separately, using the version control system's own commands. This way it is possible to pass extra flags to the version control system when necessary, and to perform other preparation steps (such as configuration generation, or activating credentials) before running terraform init.
trans-unit.target: 对于日常使用，建议使用版本控制系统自己的命令分别从版本控制中检出配置。这样，可以在必要时将额外的标志传递给版本控制系统，并在运行 terraform init 之前执行其他准备步骤（例如，配置生成或激活凭证）。

trans-unit.source: For server addresses, use a provider-specific resource to create a DNS record with a predictable name and then either use that name directly or use the dns provider to retrieve the published addresses in other configurations.
trans-unit.target: 对于服务器地址，使用供应商特定的资源创建一个DNS记录与预测的名称，然后直接使用该名称或使用的 dns 提供商在其他配置检索公布的地址。

trans-unit.source: For simplicity here we will assume you are already using a set of IAM credentials with suitable access to create Lambda functions and work with API Gateway. If you aren't sure and are working in an AWS account used only for development, the simplest approach to get started is to use credentials with full administrative access to the target AWS account.
trans-unit.target: 为了简单起见,这里我们将假设您已经使用一组具有适当访问权限的 IAM 凭证来创建 Lambda 函数并与 API Gateway 一起工作。如果您不确定,并且在仅用于开发的 AWS 帐户中工作,那么最简单的入门方法是使用对目标 AWS 帐户具有完全管理权限的凭证。

trans-unit.source: For simplicity here, we will assume you are already using a set of IAM credentials with suitable access to create AutoScaling, EC2, EKS, and IAM resources. If you are not sure and are working in an AWS account used only for development, the simplest approach to get started is to use credentials with full administrative access to the target AWS account.
trans-unit.target: 为了简单起见,我们将假设您已经使用一组具有适当访问权限的 IAM 凭证来创建 AutoScaling、EC2、EKS 和 IAM 资源。如果您不确定,并且正在一个仅用于开发的 AWS 帐户中工作,那么最简单的方法是使用对目标 AWS 帐户具有完全管理权限的凭证来开始。

trans-unit.source: For small infrastructures, Terraform can query your providers and sync the latest attributes from all your resources. This is the default behavior of Terraform: for every plan and apply, Terraform will sync all resources in your state.
trans-unit.target: 对于小型基础设施,Terraform可以查询你的供应商,并同步所有资源的最新属性。这是Terraform的默认行为:对于每一个计划和应用,Terraform都会同步你状态下的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: For some background on graph theory, and a summary of how Terraform applies it, see the HashiCorp 2016 presentation Applying Graph Theory to Infrastructure as Code. This presentation also covers some similar ideas to the following guide.
trans-unit.target: 有关图论的一些背景以及Terraform如何应用它的概述，请参见HashiCorp 2016的演讲《将图论应用于基础设施作为代码》。本演示文稿还涵盖了与以下指南类似的想法。

trans-unit.source: For some providers like AWS, Terraform could theoretically use something like AWS tags. Early prototypes of Terraform actually had no state files and used this method. However, we quickly ran into problems. The first major issue was a simple one: not all resources support tags, and not all cloud providers support tags.
trans-unit.target: 对于AWS等一些提供商,Terraform理论上可以使用类似AWS标签的东西。Terraform的早期原型其实没有状态文件,使用了这种方法。然而,我们很快就遇到了问题。第一个主要问题很简单:不是所有的资源都支持标签,也不是所有的云提供商都支持标签。

trans-unit.source: For teams that use Terraform as a key part of a change management and deployment pipeline, it can be desirable to orchestrate Terraform runs in some sort of automation in order to ensure consistency between runs, and provide other interesting features such as integration with version control hooks.
trans-unit.target: 对于使用Terraform作为变更管理和部署管道的关键部分的团队来说,为了确保运行之间的一致性,并提供其他有趣的功能,如与版本控制钩子的集成,在某种自动化中协调Terraform运行可能是可取的。

trans-unit.source: Generic Git repositories are also supported. The value of source in this case should be a complete Git-compatible URL. Using generic Git repositories requires that Git is installed on your system.
trans-unit.target: 还支持通用Git存储库。在这种情况下， source 的值应为完整的Git兼容URL。使用通用Git存储库要求在系统上安装Git。

trans-unit.source: Generic HTTP repositories are supported, and state from different configurations may be kept at different subpaths within the repository.
trans-unit.target: 支持通用的HTTP存储库,不同配置的状态可以保存在存储库内的不同子路径。

trans-unit.source: Generic Mercurial Repository
trans-unit.target: 通用Mercurial存储库

trans-unit.source: Generic Mercurial repositories are supported. The value of source in this case should be a complete Mercurial-compatible URL. Using generic Mercurial repositories requires that Mercurial is installed on your system. You must tell Terraform that your source is a Mercurial repository by prefixing it with hg::.
trans-unit.target: 支持通用Mercurial存储库。在这种情况下， source 的值应为与Mercurial兼容的完整URL。使用通用Mercurial存储库要求在系统上安装Mercurial。您必须通过给其前缀 hg:: 来告诉Terraform您的 source 是Mercurial存储库。

trans-unit.source: Given a hostname, discovery begins by forming an initial discovery URL using that hostname with the https: scheme and the fixed path /.well-known/terraform.json.
trans-unit.target: 在给定主机名的情况下，发现始于使用带有 https: 方案和固定路径 /.well-known/terraform.json 的主机名形成初始发现URL 。

trans-unit.source: Given a version control source, it can serve as a shorthand for checking out a configuration from version control and then initializing the work directory for it.
trans-unit.target: 给定一个版本控制源,它可以作为从版本控制中检查出一个配置,然后为其初始化工作目录的简写。

trans-unit.source: Given that provider plugins can be quite large (on the order of hundreds of megabytes), this default behavior can be inconvenient for those with slow or metered Internet connections. Therefore Terraform optionally allows the use of a local directory as a shared plugin cache, which then allows each distinct plugin binary to be downloaded only once.
trans-unit.target: 考虑到供应商的插件可能相当大(几百兆),这种默认的行为对于那些慢速或计费的互联网连接来说可能是不方便的。因此,Terraform可以选择允许使用本地目录作为共享插件缓存,这样就可以让每个不同的插件二进制文件只下载一次。

trans-unit.source: If source_datacenter and source_datastore are not provided, the file resource will upload the file from the host that Terraform is running on. If either source_datacenter or source_datastore are provided, the resource will copy from within specified locations in vSphere.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 source_datacenter 和 source_datastore ，则文件资源将从运行Terraform的主机上载文件。如果提供了 source_datacenter 或 source_datastore ，则资源将从vSphere中的指定位置复制。

trans-unit.source: If wait_for_elb_capacity is set, Terraform will wait for exactly that number of Instances to be "InService" in all attached ELBs on both creation and updates.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 wait_for_elb_capacity ,则在创建和更新时，Terraform将等待所有连接的ELB中确切数量的实例为 "InService" 。

trans-unit.source: If when = "destroy" is specified, the provisioner will run when the resource it is defined within is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 when = "destroy" ，则在其内定义的资源被销毁时，配置程序将运行。

trans-unit.source: If ASG creation takes more than a few minutes, this could indicate one of a number of configuration problems. See the AWS Docs on Load Balancer Troubleshooting for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建ASG花费的时间超过几分钟，则可能表明许多配置问题之一。有关更多信息，请参阅AWS Docs on Load Balancer故障排除。

trans-unit.source: If PATH is "-" then the state data to push is read from stdin. This data is loaded completely into memory and verified prior to being written to the destination state.
trans-unit.target: 如果PATH为"-",那么要推送的状态数据将从stdin中读取。这些数据被完全加载到内存中,并在写入目标状态之前进行验证。

trans-unit.source: If Terraform doesn't detect a VCS, it will upload all files.
trans-unit.target: 如果Terraform没有检测到VCS,它将上传所有文件。

trans-unit.source: If Terraform ever crashes (a "panic" in the Go runtime), it saves a log file with the debug logs from the session as well as the panic message and backtrace to crash.log. Generally speaking, this log file is meant to be passed along to the developers via a GitHub Issue. As a user, you're not required to dig into this file.
trans-unit.target: 如果Terraform曾经崩溃过（在Go运行时中出现“紧急情况”），它将使用会话中的调试日志以及紧急消息和回溯将日志文件保存到 crash.log 中。一般来说，该日志文件旨在通过GitHub Issue传递给开发人员。作为用户，您无需深入研究此文件。

trans-unit.source: If a Terraform state for one configuration is stored in a remote backend that is accessible to other configurations then terraform_remote_state can be used to directly consume its root module outputs from those other configurations. This creates a tighter coupling between configurations, but avoids the need for the "producer" configuration to explicitly publish its results in a separate system.
trans-unit.target: 如果一种配置的Terraform状态存储在其他配置可访问的远程后端中，则 terraform_remote_state 可用于直接使用其他配置的根模块输出。这在配置之间创建了更紧密的耦合，但是避免了需要“生产者”配置将其结果显式发布到单独的系统中。

trans-unit.source: If a creation-time provisioner fails, the resource is marked as tainted. A tainted resource will be planned for destruction and recreation upon the next terraform apply. Terraform does this because a failed provisioner can leave a resource in a semi-configured state. Because Terraform cannot reason about what the provisioner does, the only way to ensure proper creation of a resource is to recreate it. This is tainting.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建时供应商失败，则将该资源标记为污染。受污染的资源将在下一个 terraform apply 时计划销毁和娱乐。Terraform这样做是因为失败的预配器可以使资源处于半配置状态。由于Terraform无法推断供应者的行为，因此确保正确创建资源的唯一方法是重新创建资源。这是污点。

trans-unit.source: If a diff is present, traverse all resource nodes and find resources that are being destroyed. These resource nodes are split into two: one node that destroys the resource and another that creates the resource (if it is being recreated). The reason the nodes must be split is because the destroy order is often different from the create order, and so they can't be represented by a single graph node.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在diff,遍历所有资源节点,找到正在销毁的资源。这些资源节点被分割成两个:一个节点销毁资源,另一个节点创建资源(如果资源被重新创建)。节点必须被拆分的原因是销毁顺序与创建顺序往往不同,所以不能用一个图节点来表示。

trans-unit.source: If a module is already downloaded and the -update flag is not set, Terraform will do nothing. As a result, it is safe (and fast) to run this command multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经下载了模块并且未设置 -update 标志，则Terraform将不执行任何操作。因此，多次运行此命令是安全（快速）的。

trans-unit.source: If a module is verified, it is promised to be actively maintained and of high quality. It isn't indicative of flexibility or feature support; very simple modules can be verified just because they're great examples of modules. Likewise, an unverified module could be extremely high quality and actively maintained. An unverified module shouldn't be assumed to be poor quality, it only means it hasn't been created by a HashiCorp partner.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个模块被验证了,就说明它被承诺积极维护并且质量很高。这并不意味着灵活性或功能支持;非常简单的模块可以被验证,只是因为它们是模块的好例子。同样,一个未经验证的模块也可能是质量极高且积极维护的。一个未经验证的模块不应该被认为是低质量的,它只能说明它不是由HashiCorp的合作伙伴创建的。

trans-unit.source: If a resource was just created and did not exist before, and the apply succeeded without error, then the provisioners are executed in sequence. If any provisioner errors, the resource is marked as tainted, so that it will be destroyed on the next apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果资源是刚刚创建的并且之前不存在，并且应用成功且没有错误，则预配器将按顺序执行。如果提供者有任何错误，则将该资源标记为污染，以便在下次应用时将其销毁。

trans-unit.source: If a state file doesn't exist, the console still works and can be used to experiment with supported interpolation functions. Try entering some basic math such as 1 + 5 to see.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态文件不存在，则控制台仍然可以工作，并且可以用来试验支持的插值功能。尝试输入一些基本数学运算，例如 1 + 5 。

trans-unit.source: If a state is present, any "orphan" resources are added to the graph. Orphan resources are any resources that are no longer present in the configuration but are present in the state file. Orphans never have any configuration associated with them, since the state file does not store configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在一个状态,任何 "孤儿 "资源都会被添加到图中。孤儿资源是指在配置中不再存在但在状态文件中存在的任何资源。孤儿资源永远不会有任何配置与之相关联,因为状态文件不存储配置。

trans-unit.source: If acquiring the lock is taking longer than expected, Terraform will output a status message. If Terraform doesn't output a message, state locking is still occurring if your backend supports it.
trans-unit.target: 如果获取锁的时间比预期的要长,Terraform会输出一个状态消息。如果Terraform没有输出消息,那么如果你的后台支持状态锁定,那么状态锁定仍然在发生。

trans-unit.source: If an error happens at any stage in the lifecycle of a resource, Terraform stores a partial state of the resource. This behavior is critical for Terraform to ensure that you don't end up with any zombie resources: resources that were created by Terraform but no longer managed by Terraform due to a loss of state.
trans-unit.target: 如果在资源生命周期的任何阶段发生错误，Terraform都会存储资源的部分状态。此行为对于Terraform确保没有任何僵尸资源至关重要：这些僵尸资源是Terraform创建的，但由于状态丢失而不再由Terraform管理。

trans-unit.source: If backend settings are provided in multiple locations, the top-level settings are merged such that any command-line options override the settings in the main configuration and then the command-line options are processed in order, with later options overriding values set by earlier options.
trans-unit.target: 如果后台设置在多个位置提供,则合并顶层设置,使任何命令行选项覆盖主配置中的设置,然后按顺序处理命令行选项,后面的选项覆盖前面选项设置的值。

trans-unit.source: If both "name" and "version" are provided the plugin will concatenate the two strings in this format [name]-[version].
trans-unit.target: 如果同时提供了 "名称 "和 "版本",插件将以[名称]-[版本]的格式连接这两个字符串。

trans-unit.source: If both VPCs are not in the same AWS account do not enable the auto_accept attribute. The accepter can manage its side of the connection using the aws_vpc_peering_connection_accepter resource or accept the connection manually using the AWS Management Console, AWS CLI, through SDKs, etc.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个VPC不在同一个AWS账户中，请不要启用 auto_accept 属性。接受者可以使用 aws_vpc_peering_connection_accepter 资源管理其连接端，或者使用AWS管理控制台，AWS CLI，通过SDK等手动接受连接。

trans-unit.source: If credentials for the given hostname are available in the CLI config then they will be included in the request for the discovery document.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定主机名的凭据在CLI配置中可用，则它们将包含在发现文档的请求中。

trans-unit.source: If desired, you can leave the body of the resource block blank for now and return to fill it in once the instance is imported.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要的话,可以暂时将资源块的主体留空,等实例导入后再返回来填写。

trans-unit.source: If no provider field is specified, the default provider is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 provider 字段，则使用默认提供程序。

trans-unit.source: If no arguments are given, the configuration in the current working directory is initialized. It is recommended to run Terraform with the current working directory set to the root directory of the configuration, and omit the DIR argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供任何参数，则将初始化当前工作目录中的配置。建议在当前工作目录设置为配置的根目录的情况下运行Terraform，并省略 DIR 参数。

trans-unit.source: If no credentials are specified, the provider will fall back to using the Google Application Default Credentials. If you are running Terraform from a GCE instance, see Creating and Enabling Service Accounts for Instances for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定凭据，则提供程序将退回到使用Google应用默认凭据。如果要从GCE实例运行Terraform，请参阅为实例创建和启用服务帐户以获取详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If partial mode (covered next) is enabled when a create or update returns, only the explicitly enabled configuration keys are persisted, resulting in a partial state.
trans-unit.target: 如果在创建或更新返回时启用了部分模式(下文将介绍),那么只有显式启用的配置键会被持久化,从而形成部分状态。

trans-unit.source: If provided with a role ARN, Terraform will attempt to assume this role using the supplied credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了一个角色ARN,Terraform将尝试使用提供的凭证来承担这个角色。

trans-unit.source: If set to "false" or "0", causes terraform commands to behave as if the -input=false flag was specified. This is used when you want to disable prompts for variables that haven't had their values specified. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为“ false”或“ 0”，将导致terraform命令的行为就像指定了 -input=false 标志一样。当您要禁用对尚未指定其值的变量的提示时，将使用此选项。例如：

trans-unit.source: If set to any value, enables detailed logs to appear on stderr which is useful for debugging. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为任何值,使详细的日志显示在stderr上,这对调试很有用。例如:如果设置为任意值,则使详细的日志显示在stderr上,这对调试很有用。

trans-unit.source: If such a block is not present, the child module will behave as if it has no configurations of this type at all, which may cause input prompts to supply any required provider configuration arguments. This limitation will be addressed in a future version of Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在这样的块,子模块的行为就像它根本没有这种类型的配置一样,这可能会导致输入提示,要求提供任何所需的提供者配置参数。这个限制将在Terraform的未来版本中解决。

trans-unit.source: If supported by your backend, Terraform will lock your state for all operations that could write state. This prevents others from acquiring the lock and potentially corrupting your state.
trans-unit.target: 如果后端支持，则Terraform将锁定所有可能写入状态的操作的状态。这样可以防止其他人获取锁并可能破坏您的状态。

trans-unit.source: If the -state flag is given, the state specified by the given path will be copied to initialize the state for this new workspace.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 -state 标志，则将复制给定路径指定的状态以初始化此新工作空间的状态。

trans-unit.source: If the Create callback returns with or without an error and an ID has been set, the resource is assumed created and all state is saved with it. Repeating because it is important: if there is an error, but the ID is set, the state is fully saved.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Create 回调返回（带或不带错误）并且已设置ID，则假定资源已创建，并且所有状态都随其保存。重复，因为它很重要：如果有错误，但是设置了ID，则状态将完全保存。

trans-unit.source: If the Create callback returns with or without an error without an ID set using SetId, the resource is assumed to not be created, and no state is saved.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Create 回调在没有使用 SetId 设置ID的情况下返回有无错误，则假定资源未创建，并且不保存任何状态。

trans-unit.source: If the Destroy callback returns with an error, the resource is assumed to still exist, and all prior state is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Destroy 回调返回错误，则认为资源仍然存在，并保留所有先前状态。

trans-unit.source: If the Destroy callback returns without an error, the resource is assumed to be destroyed, and all state is removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Destroy 回调没有错误返回，则认为资源已被破坏，并且所有状态都被删除。

trans-unit.source: If the Update callback returns with or without an error, the full state is saved. If the ID becomes blank, the resource is destroyed (even within an update, though this shouldn't happen except in error scenarios).
trans-unit.target: 如果 Update 回调返回时有无错误，则将保存完整状态。如果ID变为空白，则资源将被销毁（即使在更新内，但除非发生错误情况，否则这不会发生）。

trans-unit.source: If the group param and none of the Profiles params are specified, then the Profile Setting is set to None.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定 group 参数，并且没有指定任何 Profiles 参数，则Profile Setting设置为 None 。

trans-unit.source: If the ARN of the ssl_certificate_id that is pointed to references a certificate that was signed by an ECDSA key, note that ELB only supports the P256 and P384 curves. Using a certificate signed by a key using a different curve could produce the error ERR_SSL_VERSION_OR_CIPHER_MISMATCH in your browser.
trans-unit.target: 如果指向 ssl_certificate_id 的ARN 引用了由ECDSA密钥签名的证书，请注意ELB仅支持P256和P384曲线。使用由密钥使用不同曲线签名的证书可能会在浏览器中产生错误 ERR_SSL_VERSION_OR_CIPHER_MISMATCH 。

trans-unit.source: If the Consul agent is running on the node where this service is registered, it is not recommended to use this resource.
trans-unit.target: 如果Consul代理运行在注册该服务的节点上,不建议使用该资源。

trans-unit.source: If the ID is updated to blank, this tells Terraform the resource no longer exists (maybe it was destroyed out of band). Just like the destroy callback, the Read function should gracefully handle this case.
trans-unit.target: 如果将ID更新为空白，这将告诉Terraform资源不再存在（可能已被带外销毁）。就像destroy回调一样， Read 函数应该可以很好地处理这种情况。

trans-unit.source: If the arguments of a data instance contain no references to computed values, such as attributes of resources that have not yet been created, then the data instance will be read and its state updated during Terraform's "refresh" phase, which by default runs prior to creating a plan. This ensures that the retrieved data is available for use during planning and the diff will show the real values obtained.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据实例的参数不包含对计算值的引用,例如尚未创建的资源属性,那么在Terraform的 "刷新 "阶段,数据实例将被读取并更新其状态,该阶段默认在创建计划之前运行。这样可以确保检索到的数据在计划期间可以使用,并且差异将显示获得的真实值。

trans-unit.source: If the command is given an existing saved plan as an argument, the command will output the contents of the saved plan. In this scenario, the plan command will not modify the given plan. This can be used to inspect a planfile.
trans-unit.target: 如果为命令提供了一个现有保存的计划作为参数，则该命令将输出保存的计划的内容。在这种情况下， plan 命令将不会修改给定的计划。这可用于检查计划文件。

trans-unit.source: If the credentials for the Rancher provider have access to the global API, then environment_id can be omitted e.g.
trans-unit.target: 如果Rancher提供程序的凭据可以访问全局API，则可以省略 environment_id ,例如

trans-unit.source: If the credentials for the Rancher provider have access to the global API, then then environment_id can be omitted e.g.
trans-unit.target: 如果Rancher提供者的凭证可以访问全局API，则可以省略 environment_id ,例如

trans-unit.source: If the credentials for the Rancher provider have access to the global API, then then registry_id can be omitted e.g.
trans-unit.target: 如果Rancher提供者的凭证可以访问全局API，则可以省略 registry_id 例如

trans-unit.source: If the given address does not have a resource spec, and instead just specifies a module path, the target applies to all resources in the specified module and all of the descendent modules of the specified module.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的地址不具备的资源规范，而是只指定一个模块路径，目标适用于所有资源指定模块中与所有指定模块的后裔模块。

trans-unit.source: If the given address has a resource spec, only the specified resource is targeted. If the named resource uses count and no explicit index is specified in the address, all of the instances sharing the given resource name are targeted.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定地址具有资源规范，则仅指定资源为目标。如果命名资源使用 count 且在地址中未指定显式索引，则将共享给定资源名称的所有实例作为目标。

trans-unit.source: If the program encounters an error and is unable to produce a result, it must print a human-readable error message (ideally a single line) to stderr and exit with a non-zero status. Any data on stdout is ignored if the program returns a non-zero status.
trans-unit.target: 如果程序遇到错误并且无法产生结果，则它必须将可读的错误消息（最好是单行）打印到 stderr 并以非零状态退出。如果程序返回非零状态，则 stdout 上的所有数据都将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If the response is a valid JSON object then its keys are Terraform native service identifiers, consisting of a service type name and a version string separated by a period. For example, the service identifier for version 1 of the module registry protocol is modules.v1.
trans-unit.target: 如果响应是有效的JSON对象，则其键为Terraform本机服务标识符，由服务类型名称和由句点分隔的版本字符串组成。例如，模块注册协议版本1的服务标识符是 modules.v1 。

trans-unit.source: If the response is an HTTP redirect then Terraform repeats this step with the new location as its discovery URL. Terraform is guaranteed to follow at least one redirect, but nested redirects are not guaranteed nor recommended.
trans-unit.target: 如果响应是HTTP重定向,那么Terraform就会用新的位置作为发现URL重复这一步。Terraform保证至少遵循一个重定向,但不保证也不建议使用嵌套重定向。

trans-unit.source: If the selected plugin is not already in the cache, it will be downloaded into the cache first and then copied from there into the correct location under your current working directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择的插件还没有在缓存中,会先下载到缓存中,然后从那里复制到你当前工作目录下的正确位置。

trans-unit.source: If the source AMI has associated EBS snapshots, those will also be duplicated along with the AMI.
trans-unit.target: 如果源AMI有相关的EBS快照,这些快照也会和AMI一起被复制。

trans-unit.source: If the source is /foo (no trailing slash), and the destination is /tmp, then the contents of /foo on the local machine will be uploaded to /tmp/foo on the remote machine. The foo directory on the remote machine will be created by Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 如果源是 /foo （没有斜杠），而目标是 /tmp ，则本地计算机上 /foo 的内容将被上载到远程计算机上的 /tmp/foo 。该 foo 在远程机器上的目录将被Terraform创建。

trans-unit.source: If the source refers to an example configuration, it can be copied into a local directory to be used as a basis for a new configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果源引用了示例配置，则可以将其复制到本地目录中，以用作新配置的基础。

trans-unit.source: If the source, however, is /foo/ (a trailing slash is present), and the destination is /tmp, then the contents of /foo will be uploaded directly into /tmp.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果源是 /foo/ （存在斜杠），而目标是 /tmp ，则 /foo 的内容将直接上传到 /tmp 。

trans-unit.source: If the subscription has a topic in a different project:
trans-unit.target: 如果认购在不同的项目中有一个主题。

trans-unit.source: If the supplied entry value is invalid for the image list, Terraform will exit with an error, that the desired image list entry was not found.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的 entry 值对于图像列表无效，则Terraform将退出并显示错误，表明找不到所需的图像列表条目。

trans-unit.source: If the values of the measurements to be rolled up are: 2, 10, 5:
trans-unit.target: 如果要卷起的测量值是。2,10,5:

trans-unit.source: If this block is provided and both username and password are empty, basic authentication will be disabled. This block also contains several computed attributes, documented below. If this block is not provided, GKE will generate a password for you with the username admin.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供此块，并且 username 和 password 均为空，则基本身份验证将被禁用。此块还包含几个计算出的属性，在下面记录。如果未提供此阻止，则GKE将使用用户名 admin 为您生成一个密码。

trans-unit.source: If this happens only an entity with roles/storage.admin privileges can repair this bucket's policies. It is recommended to include the above roles in policies to get the same behaviour as with the other two options.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生这种情况，则只有具有 roles/storage.admin 特权的实体才能修复此存储桶的策略。建议将上述角色包括在策略中，以获得与其他两个选项相同的行为。

trans-unit.source: If we instead set -module-depth=0, the graph will look like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果我们改为设置 -module-depth=0 ，则图形将如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If workspace IAM roles are centrally managed and shared across many separate Terraform configurations, the role ARNs could also be obtained via a data source such as terraform_remote_state to avoid repeating these values.
trans-unit.target: 如果对工作区IAM角色进行集中管理并在许多单独的Terraform配置中共享，则还可通过诸如 terraform_remote_state 之类的数据源来获取角色ARN，以避免重复这些值。

trans-unit.source: If you are going to be at HashiDays or HashiConf, let us know and we will set the goodies aside for you. Otherwise please feel free to reach out to Beth Fuller with your address and she’ll send that to you.
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算参加HashiDays或HashiConf，请告诉我们，我们将为您准备好东西。否则，请随时与您联系以联系Beth Fuller，她将把它发送给您。

trans-unit.source: If you are planning on using kubectl to manage the Kubernetes cluster, now might be a great time to configure your client. The below Terraform output generates a sample kubectl configuration to connect to your cluster.
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算使用 kubectl 管理Kubernetes集群，那么现在可能是配置客户端的好时机。下面的Terraform输出生成一个示例 kubectl 配置以连接到您的集群。

trans-unit.source: If you are planning to locally use the standard Kubernetes client, kubectl, it must be at least version 1.10 to support exec authentication with usage of heptio-authenticator-aws. For additional information about installation and configuration of these applications, see their official documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算在本地使用标准的Kubernetes客户端 kubectl ，它必须至少为1.10版本才能支持使用 heptio-authenticator-aws 的 exec 身份验证。有关这些应用程序的安装和配置的其他信息，请参阅其官方文档。

trans-unit.source: If you are restoring a bootable storage volume from a snapshot, additionally you must specify the value for bootable as true. snapshot_id and snapshot_source are not used when creating a volume from a colocated snapshot.
trans-unit.target: 如果要从快照还原可引导存储卷，则必须另外将 bootable 的值指定为 true 。 snapshot_id 和 snapshot_source 是不产生从协同定位的快照卷时使用。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from a previous Terraform version and you were using the API v1, you will need to upgrade the DNSimple provider configuration to use the new API access token and specify the Account ID. Terraform will automatically detect an existing legacy configurations and it will return an error message asking to upgrade.
trans-unit.target: 如果您从以前的Terraform版本升级,并且您使用的是API v1,您需要升级DNSimple提供商配置以使用新的API访问令牌,并指定账户ID。Terraform会自动检测现有的传统配置,并返回错误信息要求升级。

trans-unit.source: If you delete a DHCP Options Set, all VPCs using it will be associated to AWS's default DHCP Option Set.
trans-unit.target: 如果删除DHCP选项集，则使用它的所有VPC都将与AWS的 default DHCP选项集关联。

trans-unit.source: If you delete a workspace with a non-empty state (via -force), then resources may become "dangling". These are resources that physically exist but that Terraform can no longer manage. This is sometimes preferred: you want Terraform to stop managing resources so they can be managed some other way. Most of the time, however, this is not intended and so Terraform protects you from getting into this situation.
trans-unit.target: 如果删除具有非空状态的工作区（通过 -force ），则资源可能会“悬空”。这些是物理上存在的资源，但Terraform无法再管理。有时这是首选方法：您希望Terraform停止管理资源，以便可以通过其他方式对其进行管理。但是，在大多数情况下，这不是故意的，因此Terraform可以防止您陷入这种情况。

trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 source 类型，则Terraform将尝试使用最接近的匹配，例如，假设 https://hashicorp.com/consul.git 是HTTP URL。

trans-unit.target: 如果你不提供 "application_key"、"application_secret "或 "consumer_key",提供者会尝试从ovh-cli生成的~/.ovh.conf文件中获取它们。

trans-unit.source: If you find a bug with Terraform, please include the detailed log by using a service such as gist.
trans-unit.target: 如果你发现了Terraform的一个bug,请使用gist等服务来提供详细的日志。

trans-unit.source: If you have both valid configuration in a config file and static configuration, the static one is used as override. i.e. any static field will override its counterpart loaded from the config.
trans-unit.target: 如果在配置文件中同时具有有效配置和静态配置，则将静态配置用作替代。也就是说，任何静态字段都将覆盖从配置加载的对应字段。

trans-unit.source: If you have a Terraform configuration example.tf with the contents:
trans-unit.target: 如果您有一个Terraform配置 example.tf ,其中包含以下内容：

trans-unit.source: If you have built a provider and would like to add it to this community list, please fill out this community providers form.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已经建立了提供商，并希望将其添加到此社区列表中，请填写此社区提供商表格。

trans-unit.source: If you have successfully used this provider with Rackspace and can add any additional comments, please let us know.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已经成功地使用了这个供应商与Rackspace,并可以添加任何额外的评论,请让我们知道。

trans-unit.source: If you just want to duplicate an existing AMI, possibly copying it to another region, it's better to use aws_ami_copy instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只想复制一个现有的AMI（可能将其复制到另一个区域），则最好使用 aws_ami_copy 。

trans-unit.source: If you just want to share an existing AMI with another AWS account, it's better to use aws_ami_launch_permission instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只想与另一个AWS账户共享现有的AMI，则最好使用 aws_ami_launch_permission 。

trans-unit.source: If you need Terraform to fetch modules from private GitHub repos, you must provide Terraform with credentials to authenticate as a user with read access to those repos.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要Terraform从私有的GitHub仓库中获取模块,你必须向Terraform提供认证证书,以验证你是一个对这些仓库有读取权限的用户。

trans-unit.source: If you need to run Terraform on a remote machine like a CI worker, you either need to write an SSH key to disk and set the GIT_SSH_COMMAND environment variable appropriately during the worker's provisioning process, or create a GitHub machine user with read access to the repos in question and embed its credentials into the modules' source parameters:
trans-unit.target: 如果需要在CI工作者等远程机器上运行Terraform，则需要在工作者的供应过程 GIT_SSH_COMMAND SSH密钥写入磁盘并适当设置GIT_SSH_COMMAND环境变量，或者创建具有对存储库的读取访问权限的GitHub机器用户。并将其凭据嵌入模块的 source 参数中：

trans-unit.source: If you need to use modules directly from Git, you can use SSH URIs with Terraform Enterprise. You'll need to add an SSH private key to your organization and assign it to any workspace that fetches modules from private repos. See the Terraform Enterprise docs about SSH keys for cloning modules.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要直接从Git使用模块，则可以在Terraform Enterprise中使用SSH URI。您需要将SSH私钥添加到您的组织中，并将其分配给从私有存储库中获取模块的任何工作区。有关克隆模块的SSH密钥，请参见Terraform Enterprise文档。

trans-unit.source: If you no longer want to use any backend, you can simply remove the configuration from the file. Terraform will detect this like any other change and prompt you to reinitialize.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想再使用任何后端，则只需从文件中删除配置即可。Terraform将像其他任何更改一样检测到此情况，并提示您重新初始化。

trans-unit.source: If you now run terraform apply, you see how this works.
trans-unit.target: 如果现在运行 terraform apply ，您将了解其工作原理。

trans-unit.source: If you require a user-defined list of datastores, ensure you select either userSelectedDs (for user selected only) or allFeasibleDsWithUserPreference (for automatic selection with preferred overrides) for the ha_heartbeat_datastore_policy setting.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要的数据存储的用户定义的列表中，确保选择任 userSelectedDs （用于用户仅选择的）或 allFeasibleDsWithUserPreference （用于与优选的覆盖自动选择）为 ha_heartbeat_datastore_policy 设置。

trans-unit.source: If you require access to deprecated services, such as Keystone v2 and LBaaS v1, you can use the "legacy" environment here.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要访问已弃用的服务（例如Keystone v2和LBaaS v1），则可以在此处使用“旧版”环境。

trans-unit.source: If you run Terraform only on your local machine, you can specify the module source as an SSH URI (like git@github.com:hashicorp/example.git) and Terraform will use your default SSH key to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅在本地计算机上运行Terraform，则可以将模块源指定为SSH URI（例如 git@github.com:hashicorp/example.git ），并且Terraform将使用默认的SSH密钥进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If you specify this field along with sourceImage or sourceSnapshot, the value of sizeGb must not be less than the size of the sourceImage or the size of the snapshot. * image - (Optional) The image from which to initialize this disk. This can be one of: the image's self_link, projects/{project}/global/images/{image}, projects/{project}/global/images/family/{family}, global/images/{image}, global/images/family/{family}, family/{family}, {project}/{family}, {project}/{image}, {family}, or {image}. If referred by family, the images names must include the family name. If they don't, use the google_compute_image data source. For instance, the image centos-6-v20180104 includes its family name centos-6. These images can be referred by family name here. * type - (Optional) URL of the disk type resource describing which disk type to use to create the disk. Provide this when creating the disk. * zone - (Optional) A reference to the zone where the disk resides. * disk_encryption_key - (Optional) Encrypts the disk using a customer-supplied encryption key.
trans-unit.target: 如果您将此字段与sourceImage或sourceSnapshot一起指定，则sizeGb的值不得小于sourceImage的大小或快照的大小。 * image -（可选）从中初始化该磁盘的映像。这可以是以下之一：图片的 self_link ， projects/{project}/global/images/{image} ， projects/{project}/global/images/family/{family} ， global/images/{image} ， global/images/family/{family} ， family/{family} ， {project}/{family} ， {project}/{image} ， {family} 或 {image} 。如果由家人推荐，则图像名称必须包括姓氏。如果不是，请使用google_compute_image数据源。例如，映像 centos-6-v20180104 包含其姓氏 centos-6 。这些图像可以通过姓氏在这里引用。 * type -（可选）磁盘类型资源的URL，描述用于创建磁盘的磁盘类型。创建磁盘时提供此信息。 * zone -（可选）对磁盘所在区域的引用。 * disk_encryption_key -（可选）使用客户提供的加密密钥对磁盘进行加密。

trans-unit.source: If you submit these logs with a bug report, please ensure any sensitive information has been scrubbed first!
trans-unit.target: 如果您在提交这些日志的同时也提交了错误报告,请确保任何敏感信息都已被先期清除!

trans-unit.source: If you try using this provider with Rackspace and run into bugs, you are welcomed to open a bug report / issue on Github, but please keep in mind that this is unsupported and the reported bug may not be able to be fixed.
trans-unit.target: 如果您尝试将此提供商与Rackspace一起使用,并遇到错误,欢迎您在Github上打开错误报告/问题,但请记住,这是不支持的,报告的错误可能无法修复。

trans-unit.source: If you use Terraform Enterprise, consider using the private module registry. It makes handling credentials easier, and provides full versioning support. (See Private Registries above for more info.)
trans-unit.target: 如果使用Terraform Enterprise，请考虑使用专用模块注册表。它使处理凭证更加容易，并提供完整的版本支持。（有关更多信息，请参见上面的私人注册中心。）

trans-unit.source: If you use either allowed_account_ids or forbidden_account_ids, Terraform uses several approaches to get the actual account ID in order to compare it with allowed or forbidden IDs.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 allowed_account_ids 或 forbidden_account_ids ，则Terraform使用多种方法来获取实际帐户ID，以便将其与允许或禁止的ID进行比较。

trans-unit.source: If you use either bash or zsh as your command shell, Terraform can provide tab-completion support for all command names and (at this time) some command arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 bash 或 zsh 用作命令外壳，Terraform可以为所有命令名称和（此时）某些命令参数提供制表符完成支持。

trans-unit.source: If you want to create a repository with a CamelCase name, you should provide a seperate slug
trans-unit.target: 如果你想创建一个以CamelCase为名的版本库,你应该提供一个单独的slug。

trans-unit.source: If you want to ensure that the volumes are attached in a given order, create explicit dependencies between the volumes, such as:
trans-unit.target: 如果您想确保卷按照给定的顺序进行连接,请在卷之间创建显式的依赖关系,例如。

trans-unit.source: If you want to rename or otherwise move the imported resources, the state management commands can be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果要重命名或以其他方式移动导入的资源，则可以使用状态管理命令。

trans-unit.source: If you wish to configure the provider statically you can do so
trans-unit.target: 如果您希望静态地配置提供者,您可以这样做。

trans-unit.source: If you're curious about the low-level details, keep reading!
trans-unit.target: 如果你对低级的细节感到好奇,请继续阅读!

trans-unit.source: If you're interested in provider development, then read on. The remainder of this page will assume you're familiar with plugin basics and that you already have a basic development environment setup.
trans-unit.target: 如果您对提供程序开发感兴趣，请继续阅读。本页面的其余部分将假定您熟悉插件基础知识，并且您已经具有基本的开发环境设置。

trans-unit.source: If you're interested in taking on a larger core feature, it's a good idea to get feedback early and often on the effort.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有兴趣承担一个更大的核心功能,最好能尽早和经常地获得关于努力的反馈。

trans-unit.source: If you're just reconfiguring the same backend, Terraform will still ask if you want to migrate your state. You can respond "no" in this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 如果你只是重新配置同一个后台,Terraform仍然会问你是否要迁移你的状态。在这种情况下,你可以回答 "不"。

trans-unit.source: If you're moving an item to a different state file, a backup will be created for each state file.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要将一个项目移动到不同的状态文件,将为每个状态文件创建一个备份。

trans-unit.source: If you're not signed in, this will ask you to connect with GitHub. We only ask for access to public repositories, since the public registry may only publish public modules. We require access to hooks so we can register a webhook with your repository. We require access to your email address so that we can email you alerts about your module. We will not spam you.
trans-unit.target: 如果你没有登录,这将要求你连接GitHub。我们只要求访问公共仓库,因为公共注册表可能只发布公共模块。我们需要对钩子的访问权限,这样我们就可以在你的仓库中注册一个webhook。我们需要访问您的电子邮件地址,这样我们就可以向您发送关于您的模块的提醒。我们不会向您发送垃圾邮件。

trans-unit.source: If you're running Terraform from an EC2 instance with IAM Instance Profile using IAM Role, Terraform will just ask the metadata API endpoint for credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用IAM角色从具有IAM实例配置文件的EC2实例运行Terraform，则Terraform只会向元数据API端点询问凭据。

trans-unit.source: If you're running Terraform on ECS or CodeBuild and you have configured an IAM Task Role, Terraform will use the container's Task Role. Terraform looks for the presence of the AWS_CONTAINER_CREDENTIALS_RELATIVE_URI environment variable that AWS injects when a Task Role is configured. If you have not defined a Task Role for your container or CodeBuild job, Terraform will continue to use the EC2 Role.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在ECS或CodeBuild上运行Terraform并配置了IAM任务角色，则Terraform将使用容器的任务角色。Terraform查找配置了任务角色时AWS注入的 AWS_CONTAINER_CREDENTIALS_RELATIVE_URI 环境变量的存在。如果您尚未为容器或CodeBuild作业定义任务角色，Terraform将继续使用EC2角色。

trans-unit.source: If you're using Cloudflare's Load Balancing to load-balance across multiple origin servers or data centers, you configure one of these Monitors to actively check the availability of those servers over HTTP(S).
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用 Cloudflare 的负载均衡在多个源服务器或数据中心之间进行负载均衡,您可以配置其中一个监控器,通过 HTTP(S)主动检查这些服务器的可用性。

trans-unit.source: If you're using multiple workspaces, Terraform can copy all workspaces to the destination. If Terraform detects you have multiple workspaces, it will ask if this is what you want to do.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用多个工作空间，则Terraform可以将所有工作空间复制到目标位置。如果Terraform检测到您有多个工作区，它将询问您是否要这样做。

trans-unit.source: If you've built a module that you intend to be reused, we recommend publishing the module on the Terraform Registry. This will version your module, generate documentation, and more.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已构建了要重用的模块，则建议在Terraform Registry上发布该模块。这将对模块进行版本控制，生成文档等。

trans-unit.source: If your organization is specialized enough that teams frequently use modules created by other teams, you will benefit from a private module registry.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的组织足够专业,以至于团队经常使用其他团队创建的模块,您将从私人模块注册表中受益。

trans-unit.source: If your vSphere version supports tags, keep in mind that Terraform will always attempt to read tags from a resource, even if you do not have any tags defined. Ensure that your user has access to at least read tags, or else you will encounter errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的vSphere版本支持标签，请记住，即使您未定义任何标签，Terraform也将始终尝试从资源中读取标签。确保您的用户至少有权访问读取的标签，否则您将遇到错误。

trans-unit.source: If your version doesn't appear properly, you may force a sync with GitHub by viewing your module on the registry and clicking "Force GitHub Sync" under the "Manage Module" dropdown. This process may take a few minutes. Please only do this if you do not see the version appear, since it will cause the registry to resync all versions of your module.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的版本显示不正确，则可以通过在注册表中查看模块并单击“管理模块”下拉菜单下的“强制GitHub同步”来强制与GitHub同步。此过程可能需要几分钟。如果您看不到该版本，请仅执行此操作，因为这将导致注册表重新同步模块的所有版本。

trans-unit.source: Ignored attribute names can be matched by their name, not state ID. For example, if an aws_route_table has two routes defined and the ignore_changes list contains "route", both routes will be ignored. Additionally you can also use a single entry with a wildcard (e.g. "*") which will match all attribute names. Using a partial string together with a wildcard (e.g. "rout*") is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 忽略的属性名称可以通过其名称而不是状态ID进行匹配。例如，如果 aws_route_table 定义了两个路由，而 ignore_changes 列表包含“ route”，则两个路由都将被忽略。另外，您还可以将单个条目与通配符（例如 "*" ）一起使用，该通配符将匹配所有属性名称。不支持将部分字符串与通配符（例如 "rout*" ）一起使用。

trans-unit.source: In OpenStack environments prior to the Kilo release, deleting or recreating an Instance will cause the Instance's Port(s) to be deleted. One way of working around this is to taint any Port(s) used in Instances which are to be recreated. See here for further information.
trans-unit.target: 在Kilo发行版之前的OpenStack环境中，删除或重新创建实例将导致该实例的端口被删除。解决此问题的一种方法是，污染要在实例中重新使用的任何端口。有关更多信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: In TelefonicaOpenCloud environments prior to the Kilo release, deleting or recreating an Instance will cause the Instance's Port(s) to be deleted. One way of working around this is to taint any Port(s) used in Instances which are to be recreated. See here for further information.
trans-unit.target: 在Kilo发行版之前的TelefonicaOpenCloud环境中，删除或重新创建实例将导致该实例的端口被删除。解决此问题的一种方法是，污染要在实例中重新使用的任何端口。有关更多信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: In Terraform 0.6.15 there were 42 programs in total, using around 750MB on disk. And it turns out that about 600MB of this is duplicate data! This uses up a lot of space on your hard drive and a lot of bandwidth on our CDN. Fortunately, there is a way to resolve this problem.
trans-unit.target: 在Terraform 0.6.15中,一共有42个程序,使用了大约750MB的磁盘。而事实证明,其中约有600MB是重复的数据!这占用了您的硬盘空间和我们CDN的大量带宽。这占用了您硬盘上的大量空间,也占用了我们CDN的大量带宽。幸运的是,有一个方法可以解决这个问题。

trans-unit.source: In Terraform 0.7 we merged all of the programs into the same binary. We do this by using a special command terraform internal-plugin which allows us to invoke a plugin just by calling the same Terraform binary with extra arguments. In essence, Terraform now just calls itself in order to activate the special behavior in each plugin.
trans-unit.target: 在Terraform 0.7中，我们将所有程序合并到同一二进制文件中。我们通过使用特殊的命令 terraform internal-plugin 来执行此操作，该命令允许我们仅通过调用带有额外参数的相同Terraform二进制文件来调用插件。本质上，Terraform现在只是调用自身以激活每个插件中的特殊行为。

trans-unit.source: In Terraform, a Provider is the logical abstraction of an upstream API. This guide details how to build a custom provider for Terraform.
trans-unit.target: 在Terraform中,提供者是上游API的逻辑抽象。本指南详细介绍了如何为Terraform建立一个自定义的提供者。

trans-unit.source: In a configuration with multiple modules, there are some special considerations for how resources are associated with provider configurations.
trans-unit.target: 在有多个模块的配置中,如何将资源与提供商配置关联起来,有一些特殊的考虑。

trans-unit.source: In a few seconds, your module will be created.
trans-unit.target: 几秒钟后,你的模块就会被创建。

trans-unit.source: In a real build and deploy scenario we would have an S3 bucket set aside for staging our archive and would use this to "hand off" these artifacts between the build and deploy process. For the sake of this tutorial we will create a temporary S3 bucket using the AWS CLI. S3 bucket names are globally unique, so you may need to change the --bucket= argument in the following example and substitute your new bucket name throughout the rest of this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: 在实际的构建和部署场景中，我们将预留一个S3存储桶来暂存我们的归档文件，并将使用它在构建和部署过程之间“移交”这些工件。在本教程中，我们将使用AWS CLI创建一个临时S3存储桶。 S3存储桶名称是全局唯一的，因此在以下示例中，您可能需要更改 --bucket= 参数，并在本教程的其余部分中替换新的存储桶名称。

trans-unit.source: In a regional configuration, API Gateway does not create a CloudFront distribution to route requests to the API, though a distribution can be created if needed. In either case, it is necessary to create a DNS record corresponding to the given domain name which is an alias (either Route53 alias or traditional CNAME) to the regional domain name exported in the regional_domain_name attribute.
trans-unit.target: 在区域配置中，尽管可以根据需要创建分发，但API Gateway不会创建CloudFront分发以将请求路由到API。无论哪种情况，都必须创建与给定域名相对应的DNS记录，该域名是在 regional_domain_name 属性中导出的区域域名的别名（Route53别名或传统CNAME）。

trans-unit.source: In a simple implementation of the pattern described in the prior sections, all users have access to read and write states for all workspaces. In many cases it is desirable to apply more precise access constraints to the Terraform state objects in S3, so that for example only trusted administrators are allowed to modify the production state, or to control reading of a state that contains sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: 在前面各节中描述的模式的简单实现中，所有用户都可以访问所有工作空间的读写状态。在许多情况下，希望对S3中的Terraform状态对象应用更精确的访问约束，以便例如仅允许受信任的管理员修改生产状态，或控制包含敏感信息的状态的读取。

trans-unit.source: In all cases it is recommended to keep explicit provider configurations only in the root module and pass them (whether implicitly or explicitly) down to descendent modules. This avoids the provider configurations from being "lost" when descendent modules are removed from the configuration. It also allows the user of a configuration to determine which providers require credentials by inspecting only the root module.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下,建议只在根模块中保留显式的提供者配置,并将它们(无论是隐式还是显式)传递给子模块。这样可以避免在从配置中删除子模块时 "丢失 "提供者配置。它还允许配置的用户仅通过检查根模块来确定哪些提供者需要凭证。

trans-unit.source: In both provider and resource, the schema is a map[string]*schema.Schema. The key of this map is the configuration key, and the value is a schema for the value of that key.
trans-unit.target: 在提供者和资源中，模式都是 map[string]*schema.Schema 。此映射的键是配置键，值是该键的值的架构。

trans-unit.source: In general, you should use template variables in the vars block and try not to mix interpolations. This keeps it understandable and has the benefit that you don't have to change anything to switch your template to a file.
trans-unit.target: 通常，应在 vars 块中使用模板变量，并尽量不要混合插值。这使它易于理解，并具有无需更改任何内容即可将模板切换到文件的优点。

trans-unit.source: In modules we only specify a name, rather than a name and a type as for resources. This name is used elsewhere in the configuration to reference the module and its outputs.
trans-unit.target: 在模块中,我们只指定一个名称,而不是像资源那样指定名称和类型。这个名称在配置的其他地方用于引用模块及其输出。

trans-unit.source: In more complex situations there may be multiple provider instances, or a child module may need to use different provider settings than its parent. For such situations, it's necessary to pass providers explicitly as we will see in the next section.
trans-unit.target: 在更复杂的情况下，可能有多个提供程序实例，或者子模块可能需要使用与其父模块不同的提供程序设置。在这种情况下，有必要显式地传递提供程序，这将在下一节中看到。

trans-unit.source: In most cases it should not be necessary to set this variable, but it may be useful to do so if e.g. the working directory is not writable.

trans-unit.source: In order to define wildcard principal (a.k.a. anonymous user) use type = "*" and identifiers = ["*"]. In that case the rendered json will contain "Principal": "*". Note, that even though the IAM Documentation states that "Principal": "*" and "Principal": {"AWS": "*"} are equivalent, those principals have different behavior for IAM Role Trust Policy. Therefore Terraform will normalize the principal field only in above-mentioned case and principals like type = "AWS" and identifiers = ["*"] will be rendered as "Principal": {"AWS": "*"}.
trans-unit.target: 为了定义通配符主体（又名匿名用户），请使用 type = "*" 和 identifiers = ["*"] 。在这种情况下，呈现的json将包含 "Principal": "*" 。请注意，即使IAM文档指出 "Principal": "*" 和 "Principal": {"AWS": "*"} 是等效的，这些主体在IAM角色信任策略中也具有不同的行为。因此，Terraform仅在上述情况下才会规范化主体字段，并且 type = "AWS" 和 identifiers = ["*"] "Principal": {"AWS": "*"} 将呈现为“ Principal”：{“AWS“：” *“} 。

trans-unit.source: In order to deliver on our promise to be safe and predictable, we need to be able to easily and routinely verify that Terraform Plugins produce the expected outcome. The most common usage of an acceptance test is in Terraform Providers, where each Resource is tested with configuration files and the resulting infrastructure is verified. Terraform includes a framework for constructing acceptance tests that imitate the execution of one or more steps of applying one or more configuration files, allowing multiple scenarios to be tested.
trans-unit.target: 为了实现我们对安全和可预测的承诺,我们需要能够轻松和常规地验证Terraform插件是否能产生预期的结果。验收测试最常见的用途是在Terraform Providers中,通过配置文件对每个资源进行测试,并对产生的基础设施进行验证。Terraform包含了一个构建验收测试的框架,该框架可以模仿应用一个或多个配置文件的一个或多个步骤的执行,允许多个场景进行测试。

trans-unit.source: In order to follow this guide you will need an AWS account and to have Terraform installed. Configure your credentials so that Terraform is able to act on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: 为了遵循本指南，您将需要一个AWS账户并安装Terraform。配置您的凭据，以便Terraform能够代表您执行操作。

trans-unit.source: In order to use the NSX Terraform provider you must first configure the provider to communicate with the VMware NSX manager. The NSX manager is the system which serves the NSX REST API and provides a way to configure the desired state of the NSX system. The configuration of the NSX provider requires the IP address, hostname, or FQDN of the NSX manager.
trans-unit.target: 为了使用 NSX Terraform 提供商,您必须首先配置提供商与 VMware NSX 管理器通信。NSX管理器是为NSX REST API提供服务的系统,它提供了一种配置NSX系统所需状态的方法。配置 NSX 提供商需要 NSX 管理器的 IP 地址、主机名或 FQDN。

trans-unit.source: In order to use this Provider, you must have an active account with Fastly. Pricing and signup information can be found at https://www.fastly.com/signup

trans-unit.source: In other languages, plugins are built using dynamic libraries. Since this is not an option for us in Go we use a network RPC interface instead. This means that each plugin is an independent program, and instead of communicating via shared memory, the main process communicates with the plugin process over HTTP. When you start Terraform, it identifies the plugin you want to use, finds it on disk, runs the other binary, and does some handshaking to make sure they can talk to each other (the error you may see after upgrading is a handshake failure in the RPC code).
trans-unit.target: 在其他语言中,插件是使用动态库构建的。由于在Go中我们不能选择这种方式,所以我们使用网络RPC接口来代替。这意味着每个插件都是一个独立的程序,主进程不是通过共享内存进行通信,而是通过HTTP与插件进程进行通信。当你启动Terraform时,它会识别你要使用的插件,在磁盘上找到它,运行另一个二进制程序,并进行一些握手,以确保它们可以相互交谈(升级后你可能会看到的错误是RPC代码中的握手失败)。

trans-unit.source: In particular, organizations commonly want to create a strong separation between multiple deployments of the same infrastructure serving different development stages (e.g. staging vs. production) or different internal teams. In this case, the backend used for each deployment often belongs to that deployment, with different credentials and access controls. Named workspaces are not a suitable isolation mechanism for this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 特别是，组织通常希望在服务于不同开发阶段（例如，登台与生产）或不同内部团队的同一基础架构的多个部署之间建立强烈的隔离。在这种情况下，用于每个部署的后端通常属于该部署，具有不同的凭据和访问控制。对于这种情况，命名工作区不是合适的隔离机制。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of Terraform all of the plugins were included in a zip file. For example, when you upgraded from 0.6.12 to 0.6.15, the newer version of each plugin file would have replaced the older one on disk, and you would have ended up with the latest version of each plugin.
trans-unit.target: 在以前的Terraform版本中,所有的插件都包含在一个zip文件中。例如,当你从0.6.12升级到0.6.15时,每个插件文件的新版本将取代磁盘上的旧版本,你将最终获得每个插件的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: In rare cases, we might decide that a PR should be closed. We'll make sure to provide clear reasoning when this happens.
trans-unit.target: 在极少数情况下,我们可能会决定关闭某个PR。在这种情况下,我们会确保提供明确的理由。

trans-unit.source: In reality, it is a bit more complicated than this. Imagine the scenario where our update function has to update two separate fields which require two separate API calls. What do we do if the first API call succeeds but the second fails? How do we properly tell Terraform to only persist half the diff? This is known as a partial state scenario, and implementing these properly is critical to a well-behaving provider.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，这要复杂得多。设想一下我们的更新功能必须更新两个单独的字段（需要两个单独的API调用）的情况。如果第一个API调用成功但第二个API失败，该怎么办？我们如何正确地告诉Terraform只保留差异的一半？这被称为部分状态方案，正确实施这些方案对于行为良好的提供者至关重要。

trans-unit.target: 在支持用户定义的标签或标签的系统中，使用标签约定使资源可自动发现。例如，使用的 aws_vpc 资源类型来分配合适的标签，然后将 aws_vpc 数据源通过在其它配置中这些代码查询。

trans-unit.source: In the 0.9 line of Terraform releases, this concept was known as "environment". It was renamed in 0.10 based on feedback about confusion caused by the overloading of the word "environment" both within Terraform itself and within organizations that use Terraform.

This pattern of first applying and checking a basic configuration, followed by applying a modified configuration with updated or additional checks is a common pattern used to test update functionality.

trans-unit.source: Individual Resources may provide a timeouts block to enable users to configure the amount of time a specific operation is allowed to take before being considered an error. For example, the aws_db_instance resource provides configurable timeouts for the create, update, and delete operations. Any Resource that provides Timeouts will document the default values for that operation, and users can overwrite them in their configuration.
trans-unit.target: 单独的资源可以提供 timeouts 块，以使用户能够配置允许特定操作在被视为错误之前所花费的时间。例如，aws_db_instance资源为 create ， update 和 delete 操作提供可配置的超时。提供超时的任何资源都将记录该操作的默认值，用户可以在其配置中覆盖它们。

trans-unit.source: Individual Resources must opt-in to providing configurable Timeouts, and attempting to configure the timeout for a Resource that does not support Timeouts, or overwriting a specific action that the Resource does not specify as an option, will result in an error. Valid units of time are s, m, h.
trans-unit.target: 各个资源必须选择提供可配置的超时，并且尝试为不支持超时的资源配置超时，或者覆盖该资源未指定为选项的特定操作，将导致错误。有效的时间单位是 s ， m ， h 。

trans-unit.source: Instead of using -target as a means to operate on isolated portions of very large configurations, prefer instead to break large configurations into several smaller configurations that can each be independently applied. Data sources can be used to access information about resources created in other configurations, allowing a complex system architecture to be broken down into more managable parts that can be updated independently.
trans-unit.target: 与其使用 -target 作为对非常大的配置的隔离部分进行操作的手段，不如将大的配置分解为几个可以独立应用的较小的配置。数据源可用于访问有关在其他配置中创建的资源的信息，从而可以将复杂的系统体系结构分解为易于管理的部分，这些部分可以独立更新。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use one or more re-usable modules to represent the common elements, and then represent each instance as a separate configuration that instantiates those common elements in the context of a different backend. In that case, the root module of each configuration will consist only of a backend configuration and a small number of module blocks whose arguments describe any small differences between the deployments.
trans-unit.target: 而是使用一个或多个可重复使用的模块表示公共元素，然后将每个实例表示为单独的配置，该配置在不同后端的上下文中实例化这些公共元素。在这种情况下，每个配置的根模块将仅由一个后端配置和少量 module 块组成，这些模块块的参数描述了部署之间的任何细微差异。

trans-unit.source: Instead, we've developed some higher level libraries to help you out with developing providers. These are the same libraries we use in our own core providers.

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to apply such fine-grained access control to the DynamoDB table used for locking, so it is possible for any user with Terraform access to lock any workspace state, even if they do not have access to read or write that state. If a malicious user has such access they could block attempts to use Terraform against some or all of your workspaces as long as locking is enabled in the backend configuration.
trans-unit.target: 不可能对用于锁定的DynamoDB表进行如此精细的访问控制,因此任何具有Terraform访问权限的用户都有可能锁定任何工作空间状态,即使他们没有读取或写入该状态的权限。如果恶意用户拥有这样的访问权限,只要在后台配置中启用了锁定功能,他们就可以阻止对部分或全部工作空间使用Terraform的尝试。

trans-unit.source: It uses the same VCS-backed tagged release workflow as the Terraform Registry, but imports modules from your private VCS repos (on any of TFE's supported VCS providers) instead of requiring public GitHub repos. You can seamlessly reference private modules in your Terraform configurations (just include a hostname in the module source), and TFE's UI provides a searchable marketplace of private modules to help your users find the code they need.
trans-unit.target: 它使用与Terraform Registry相同的VCS支持的标记发布工作流程,但从你的私有VCS仓库(在TFE支持的任何一个VCS提供商上)导入模块,而不是要求公共GitHub仓库。您可以在您的Terraform配置中无缝引用私有模块(只需在模块源中包含一个主机名),TFE的用户界面提供了一个可搜索的私有模块市场,以帮助您的用户找到他们需要的代码。

trans-unit.source: It’s important to reiterate that acceptance tests in resources create actual cloud infrastructure, with possible expenses incurred, and are the responsibility of the user running the tests. Creating real infrastructure in tests verifies the described behavior of Terraform Plugins in real world use cases against the actual APIs, and verifies both local state and remote values match. Acceptance tests require a network connection and often require credentials to access an account for the given API. When writing and testing plugins, it is highly recommended to use an account dedicated to testing, to ensure no infrastructure is created in error in any environment that cannot be completely and safely destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要重申，资源中的验收测试会创建实际的云基础架构，并产生可能的费用，并且是运行测试的用户的责任。在测试中创建真实的基础架构，可以根据实际的API验证Terraform插件在实际使用案例中的描述行为，并验证本地状态和远程值是否匹配。验收测试需要网络连接，并且通常需要凭据才能访问给定API的帐户。编写和测试插件时，强烈建议使用专用于测试的帐户，以确保不会在无法完全安全地销毁任何环境的情况下错误地创建基础架构。

trans-unit.source: It's also possible to create credentials via the legacy cross-platform CLI and the legacy PowerShell Cmdlets - however we would highly recommend using the Azure CLI above.
trans-unit.target: 也可以通过旧版跨平台CLI和旧版PowerShell Cmdlet创建凭据-但是，我们强烈建议使用上面的Azure CLI。

trans-unit.source: It's common to write custom TestCheckFunc functions to validate resources were created correctly by using SDKs directly to verify identity and properties of resources. These functions can retrieve information by SDKs and provide the results to other TestCheckFunc methods. The below example uses ComposeTestCheckFunc to group a set of TestCheckFunc functions together. The first function testAccCheckExampleWidgetExists uses the Example service SDK directly, and queries it for the ID of the widget we have in state. Once found, the result is stored into the widget struct declared at the begining of the test function. The next check function testAccCheckExampleWidgetAttributes recieves the updated widget and checks its attributes. The final check TestCheckResourceAttr verifies that the same value is stored in state.
trans-unit.target: 通常，编写定制的 TestCheckFunc 函数来验证资源是否是通过直接使用SDK来正确验证资源的身份和属性而正确创建的。这些函数可以通过SDK检索信息，并将结果提供给其他 TestCheckFunc 方法。下面的示例使用 ComposeTestCheckFunc 将一组 TestCheckFunc 函数组合在一起。第一个函数 testAccCheckExampleWidgetExists 直接使用 Example 服务SDK，并向其查询我们处于状态的窗口小部件的ID。找到后，结果将存储到在测试功能开始时声明的 widget 结构中。下一步检查功能 testAccCheckExampleWidgetAttributes 接收更新的 widget 并检查其属性。最终检查 TestCheckResourceAttr 验证状态是否存储了相同的值。

trans-unit.source: It's important to note that any project resources that were added to your Terraform config prior to 0.8.5 will continue to function as they always have, and will not be managed by Terraform. Only newly added projects are affected.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,任何在0.8.5之前添加到Terraform配置中的项目资源都将一如既往地发挥作用,而不会被Terraform管理。只有新添加的项目会受到影响。

trans-unit.source: It's possible to complete this task in either the Azure CLI or in the Azure Portal - in both we'll create a Service Principal which has Contributor rights to the subscription. It's also possible to assign other rights depending on your configuration.
trans-unit.target: 可以在Azure CLI或Azure门户中完成此任务-在这两种方法中，我们将创建对订阅具有“ Contributor 权限的服务主体。也可以根据您的配置分配其他权限。

trans-unit.source: It's possible to specify multiple block_device entries to create an instance with multiple ephemeral (local) disks. In order to create multiple ephemeral disks, the sum of the total amount of ephemeral space must be less than or equal to what the chosen flavor supports.
trans-unit.target: 它可以指定多个 block_device 项创建具有多个临时（本地）磁盘的实例。为了创建多个临时盘，临时空间的总和必须小于或等于所选风味支持的空间。

trans-unit.source: It's recommended to group together logically-related local values into a single block, particularly if they depend on each other. This will help the reader understand the relationships between variables. Conversely, prefer to define unrelated local values in separate blocks, and consider annotating each block with a comment describing any context common to all of the enclosed locals.
trans-unit.target: 建议将与逻辑相关的局部值组合到一个块中，尤其是当它们相互依赖时。这将帮助读者理解变量之间的关系。相反，更喜欢在单独的块中定义不相关的局部值，并考虑用注释注释每个块，这些注释描述了所有封闭的局部变量所共有的上下文。

trans-unit.source: It's recommended to specify create_before_destroy = true in a lifecycle block to replace a certificate which is currently in use (eg, by aws_lb_listener).
trans-unit.target: 建议在生命周期块中指定 create_before_destroy = true 来替换当前正在使用的证书（例如，通过 aws_lb_listener ）。

trans-unit.source: Items removed from the Terraform state are not physically destroyed. Items removed from the Terraform state are only no longer managed by Terraform. For example, if you remove an AWS instance from the state, the AWS instance will continue running, but terraform plan will no longer see that instance.
trans-unit.target: 从Terraform状态中删除的项目不会被物理破坏。从Terraform状态中删除的项目不再仅由Terraform管理。例如，如果您从状态中删除一个AWS实例，则该AWS实例将继续运行，但是 terraform plan 将不再看到该实例。
